main event: On February 1, 1968, a witness in New Albany, Indiana observed a peculiar flying object described as having a square configuration with four red lights arranged in a square shape, moving irregularly in the sky.
interesting points: The observation lasted about five minutes,The object was reported to appear similar to other sightings of light phenomena in the New Mexico area,The witness reported the object moving at high speeds with unusual maneuvers,The object was only seen by one confirmed individual,Comments were made about the object resembling a possible aircraft.
sighted object: a square configuration with four red lights
witness description: The observer noted the object was shaped like a square and described its movement as irregular.
